title: Khwnasongdw jwngni gabnai
lyrics:
Khwnasongdw jwngni gabnai
Jwng haoria alai-silai -2
Nwngni swrjinai gwsw-mwdwm-jiu
Nimaha hwdw jwngkhou -2
(A)
Subunga dhwrwmkhou baogarlangbai
Bifa Isorkhou lajihwbai -2
Gwmalangbai gwmwrlangbai
Gwjaolangbai bwi lwithwao -2
(B)
Subunga jiukhou khwmalangbai
Songsarni dhwnkhou hastainanwi -2
Gwmalangbai gwmwrlangbai
Gwjaolangbai bwi lwithwao -2
